name: Bitrunner
description:
Bitrunner is 2D platformer where you can create your own platforms. 

You play as a lightsaber-weilding bitcoin collector, fighting opposite forces all the way down to the bitbank. You may perform 3-strike attack combos and, more notoriously, create your own platforms by dragging your mouse across the screen. This idea came from being purely bored and drag-selecting squares across my desktop screen.

This project was developed in one week, as a part of programming classes back in February 2020, with the intent of learning object-oriented programming in Unity.

I worked on the game and level design, and C# coding.
